title: Ettuthikkum Madhayaanai (2015)
overview: A young man and his family move into a new town, but his cop-dad is one day, murdered by an unknown gang. Who is behind the killing and how is this connected to the murder of his childhood friend?
storyline: When his father is murdered by an unknown gang, Natesan sets out to find the killers. But, he is shocked to learn that his father's death has a connection with the murder of his childhood friend.
